Belgium: Rebellion of the commoners in maritime Flanders, sparked by Louis I, Count of Flanders, ceding Sluis to John I, Marquis of Namur.
Burma: Saw Zein become king of Martaban
China: Gegeen was assassinated by the Asud in a coup led by the Khongirad grand censor Tegshi.
Yesün Temür became emperor of the Yuan dynasty.
India: Ulugh Khan defeats Prataparudra II ending the Kakatiya dynasty
Sweden: The Treaty of Nöteborg is signed, establishing peace between Sweden and the Novgorod Republic.
